rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0001
rows.name:
The inside of a Divine Beast battleship is way
different from the Monoceros, huh...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0002
rows.name: What is Monoceros?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0003
rows.name:
Rex, you saw it, right? Moored at a pier
back in Goldmund?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0004
rows.name: Shin and co.'s black boat.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0005
rows.name:
Aah, that really impressive one!
It runs without being hooked up to
a Divine Beast, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm no expert, but...
yeah, looked like it.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0007
rows.name:
Sound awesome!
Tora want to see too!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0008
rows.name:
You won't get the chance, unless we
see those Iira guys again.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0009
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh-meh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0010
rows.name: Tora change mind. No need to see.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0011
rows.name:
Masterpon change mind
at drop of hat...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0012
rows.name:
Well, the Monoceros was pretty sweet,
but this is nothing to scoff at either!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0013
rows.name:
For sure.
It's full of things I've never seen before.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0014
rows.name:
Ah!
That's because this vessel is result of
latest breakthroughs in Superbian tech!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0015
rows.name:
Regular folk never so much as set foot
on board!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0016
rows.name:
You say breakthroughs in technology,
but what you mean is salvaged stuff,
right?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0017
rows.name:
Hmm, not exclusively. I see lots of
homegrown improvements as well.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0018
rows.name:
Like this, see? Whatever they've stuffed
in here, it's been messed with so much,
I can't tell what it was to start with.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0019
rows.name:
That control panel. It transmit signal
to Divine Beast nerves.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0020
rows.name:
By running cables to different parts of
Divine Beast from here, can control signal flow
much more better.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0021
rows.name:
Whaaaat...?
That's amazing.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0022
rows.name:
And this cable itself have 2.4 time the
speed and 12 time the capacity of
previous iteration.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0023
rows.name:
In other words, it on whole other level
to stuff other countries use!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0024
rows.name:
Huh! So if they put this in a smaller
Divine Beast vessel, it would work even better!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0025
rows.name: Pin-pon! Correct!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0026
rows.name:
*sigh* They seem to be having fun,
but it's all gibberish to me...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0027
rows.name: Hana, what do you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0028
rows.name: What should Hana say?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0029
rows.name: That not even so bad...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0030
rows.name: Why Masterpon act so proud?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0101
rows.name: Oh really?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0102
rows.name:
Hana have access to much
varied information.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0103
rows.name:
Considering interests of Masterpon,
technology info is especially rich.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0104
rows.name:
So for Hana is not issue,
following conversation in question.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0105
rows.name:
Moreover, if necessary, Hana could
out-geek Masterpon if Hana try.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0106
rows.name: R-right, okay...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0107
rows.name: I'm...sorry I doubted you...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0108
rows.name: No worry, Nia.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0109
rows.name:
Hana can also hold conversation on
favorite bug dishes of Nia.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0110
rows.name: You're too kind...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0111
rows.name:
I should point out though, it's not bugs
I like, but fish.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0112
rows.name:
Meh-?!
Hana apologize.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0113
rows.name:
Hana update her database now.
Masterpon not always fastidious in
data entry, so mistakes happen.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0114
rows.name:
Tora!
I like bugs now, do I...?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0115
rows.name:
Meh-meh!
Tora suddenly feel very unsafe.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0116
rows.name:
Boss, we should move on.
If we stay here, something bad
bound to happen!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0117
rows.name: Like what?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0118
rows.name: No time to waste, we go!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0201
rows.name:
Ho-hoo!
Tora very glad you ask!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0202
rows.name:
That because tech used in this Divine Beast
battleship is same as what Hana's
muscles and drivetrain use!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0203
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Hana is surprised!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0204
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]But however though!
Ones that Hana use are even more
improved than these here!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0205
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Yet more surprise!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0206
rows.name:
...Are you saying you stole the tech
from Superbia?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0207
rows.name:
Come on, Tora...
Is that what you call sporting behavior?

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0208
rows.name:
Tora take calculated risk in service to
cause of scientific advancement...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0209
rows.name:
As result, not even Superbian
scientists capable of reverse-engineer
Hana systems!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0210
rows.name: So no worries there!

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0211
rows.name:
Upon learning secret of Hana's birth,
Hana feel sense of unease...

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0212
rows.name:
E-everything fine!
...Probably.

rows.label: kizunatalk012_msg0213
rows.name:
Now, boss! No time for chit-chat.
Let's get going!
